content: correspond (entsprechen) sooner to Heraclitus’ thinking if… [why does it become clear?] > logos as Ratio, Verbum, cosmic law, the logical, necessity in thought, meaning & reason
linkedContent: correspond (entsprechen) sooner to Heraclitus’ thinking if… [why does it become clear?] > logos as Ratio, Verbum, cosmic law, the logical, necessity in thought, meaning & reason

content: [Nietzsche-like] forgetting to meditate on essential origin of reason, let itself into its advent (Ankunft) [arrival] > more originally (ursprünglicher), legein as “bringing together,” legere as lesen, collecting & bringing together (Zusammenbringen)

content: categories make safekeeping not seem like a gathering
linkedContent: categories make safekeeping not seem like a gathering

content: “something extra (mehr)” than amassing (Anhäufen): to gathering belongs a collecting which brings under shelter (Zum Sammeln gehört das einholende Einbringen), accommodation governs the sheltering, which is governed by safekeeping (Darin waltet das Unterbringen; in diesem jedoch das Verwahren) > the safekeeping determines and arranges the steps of gathering that follows
linkedContent: “something extra (mehr)” than amassing (Anhäufen): to gathering belongs a collecting which brings under shelter (Zum Sammeln gehört das einholende Einbringen), accommodation governs the sheltering, which is governed by safekeeping (Darin waltet das Unterbringen; in diesem jedoch das Verwahren) > the safekeeping determines and arranges the steps of gathering that follows

content: lesen as reading (lesen) of something written, one sort of gathering, bringing-together-into-lying-before (zusammen-ins-vorliegen-bringen), the predominant sort (vorgedrängte Art)
linkedContent: lesen as reading (lesen) of something written, one sort of gathering, bringing-together-into-lying-before (zusammen-ins-vorliegen-bringen), the predominant sort (vorgedrängte Art)

content: engage (einlassen) ourselves with a question which probably decides many things: how does proper sense of legein, to lay, come to mean saying and talking? > find a foothold (Anhalt) > to lay is to gather (legen ist lesen)
linkedContent: engage (einlassen) ourselves with a question which probably decides many things: how does proper sense of legein, to lay, come to mean saying and talking? > find a foothold (Anhalt) > to lay is to gather (legen ist lesen)

content: a protection in which what lies before remains (bleibt) laid down: stored, laid away, secured & deposited in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), sheltered in unconcealment > the keisthai of upokeimenon: presencing (Anwesen) of that which lies before us into unconcealment: legein concerns safety (Geborgenheit), safekeeping, gathering appropriate to such a laying [what about annihilation?], safety of that which comes together into presence (des beisammen-Anwesenden)

content: these meanings of legein, an event (Ereignis), concealed in long unnoticed simplicity, in transformation of word meanings > the original legein (Das ursprüngliche legein)

content: gathering properly begins w/ sheltering (Bergen her eigentlich anfangende Sammeln): the vintage (die Lese) is a selection (Auslese) > most important aspect [why?] to form the vintage is the sorting (Erlesen), the fore-gathering (Vor-lese) which determines (fügt) the selection, bringing together in gathering

content: every gathering a laying, every laying is of itself a gathering > to let lie (liegen lassen), legein as letting-lie-together (beisammen-vor-liegen-Lassen) concerns us [why us?], concerned w/ retaining (behalten) [holding], protection (Hut)

content: [Heidegger’s ear] hearing more than just picking up sounds, if it is [anatomical, biological], goes in one ear out the other [but, apprehension lives (lebt) only when embodied (leibt)] > in that case, we are not gathered to what is addressed (Zugesprochene) [heterotautology of hearing and hearkening (Horchen)] > wrong direction: turn anatomical hearing into a spiritual one

content: unconcealing of concealed into unconcealment is very presencing of what is present: we call this [who is we?] Being of beings > expression (Ausdruck) & signification (Bedeutung) characteristics of language but don’t genuinely reach into realm of primordial, not capable of determining this realm in its primary characteristics (anfänglichen Wesensprägung) > man never astonished by event (Ereignis) that covers over primary meaning of Sprache, didn’t discern in it mystery (Geheimnis) to discover essential dispensation (Schickung) of Being to men

content: proper hearing (eigentliche Hören), pay thoughtful attention to simple things (nachdenkend auf Einfaches zu achten) > belongs (gehört) to proper hearing to hear wrongly (verhören)

content: logos: original assemblage of primordial gathering from primordial laying (die ursprüngliche Versammlung der anfänglichen Lese aus der anfänglichen Lege) [why originary?]
linkedContent: logos: original assemblage of primordial gathering from primordial laying (die ursprüngliche Versammlung der anfänglichen Lese aus der anfänglichen Lege) [why originary?]

content: “we are all ears when our gathering devotes itself entirely to hearkening” > “we have heard (gehört) when we belong to (gehören) the matter addressed (Zugesprochenen)”: letting that which lies before lie gathered in its entirety [wholeness], selfsameness, omologein, the letting-lie establishes

content: attention as Gehör [?] > our type of attention means we belong to the logos > omologein: [a yes to the yes of logos?]

content: having-seen & having-heard not mere grasping (Erfassen), a certain kind of behavior (Verhalten) > this abiding (hält) as devoting to what lies-before, dispatching toward [both devote & dispatch forms of schicken], such behavior is appropriate (schickliches) thus skillful (geschickt), sophon thus is fateful (geschicklich)

content: omologein as when fateful comes to pass, proper hearing [when does fateful not come to pass? Nietzsche, Derrida], the laying that gathering has sent (die lesende Lege geschickt hat): where, and as what, does the fateful presence?

content: a swarming multiplicity of meanings nestles (verschwimmende Mannigfaltigkeit von Bedeutungen nistet) in both these dangerously harmless words: en and panta [plurivocity over dissemination]

content: [method of plurivocity? compare to Derrida, dissemination] succeed in delineating more meaningfully a few characteristics of en and panta: delineation should remain a preliminary free-flowing sketch, not self-assured portrayal > must reflect w/in unity of Heraclitus’ saying [closed-context?]

content: logos essentially occurs as en panta [wholeness] > [all uniting is the one, gathering, centrifugal] > logos, gathering everything (alles) in the totality (All) of simple presencing? > Der logos legt ins Anwesen vor und legt das Anwesende ins Anwesen nieder, d.h. zurück [heterotautology: laying back into presence what is present before] > presencing: having come forward to endure in unconcealment (hervorgekommen im Unverborgenen währen) [endure, linger awhile, totality]

content: [lays what is present before into presence] > all disclosure releases (Entbergen enthebt) what is present from concealment [Lacan, return of repressed] > forgetting as a reservoir to draw from [aletheia, trace]

content: logos: destined (vom Geschick) to be appropriated (er-eignet) in omologein ——now that saying of Heraclitus speaks more clearly [oh yeah?]
linkedContent: logos: destined (vom Geschick) to be appropriated (er-eignet) in omologein ——now that saying of Heraclitus speaks more clearly [oh yeah?]

content: path for mortal thinking [?], in more primordial origin of logos [?] > logos needs omologein if present beings are to shine in presencing > omologein dispatches itself w/out presumption into the measuring (schickt sich unvermessen in das Ermessen) of logos [that Being needs human logos?]
linkedContent: path for mortal thinking [?], in more primordial origin of logos [?] > logos needs omologein if present beings are to shine in presencing > omologein dispatches itself w/out presumption into the measuring (schickt sich unvermessen in das Ermessen) of logos [that Being needs human logos?]

content: logos: Being of beings > [on technology] forgotten lightning-flash of Being emerges as that alone which is worthy of thought [Being of beings has been safeguarded, the beginning of its destiny in Greek thought, still governs modern technology]

content: what happens when Being of beings, their distinction, is brought to language? [name of Being] > “bring to language”: secure Being in essence of language [never secure, returntocinder]

content: we see this lightning only when we station ourselves in the storm of being > today we narcotize [Nietzsche] the storm, drive it away, anesthesia, rid ourselves of anxiety
linkedContent: we see this lightning only when we station ourselves in the storm of being > today we narcotize [Nietzsche] the storm, drive it away, anesthesia, rid ourselves of anxiety

content: thinking changes the world, changes world in ever darker depths of a riddle (Rätsel) > riddle propounded (zugesagt) to us [for a long time] in word “Being” > Being remains only the provisional (vorläufige) word [Being originally called “presencing (Anwesen),” enduring-here-before in unconcealment (her-vor-währen in die Unverborgenheit)] [truth and security, Wahrheit]
